stat: 1 in 4 people around the world suffer from mental disorders, more than cancer, diabetes or heart disease
author: World Health Organization

stat: 50% of teens are at risk. Half of those with mental disorders show signs by age 14 but often take more than 10 years to get treatment
author: World Health Organization

stat: 450 million people worldwide have some type of mental disorder
author: Clubhouse International

stat: Chances of having a mental illness or a substance use disorder in your lifetime in Canada: 1 in 3
author: Mood Disorders Society of Canada
